title: Harvard Billionaires Bail Out Alma Mater, Trump Takes On Harley, Netflix Keeps Growing
itunes:title: Harvard Billionaires Bail Out Alma Mater, Trump Takes On Harley, Netflix Keeps Growing
description:
Carol speaks to Michael McDonald, Bloomberg News Endowments Reporter, about Wall Street’s elite making Harvard university’s endowment a powerhouse. John Augustine, CIO at Huntington Private Bank, discusses the markets and why he likes the consumer discretionary sector. James Hardiman, Leisure Analyst at Wedbush Securities, and Craig Trudell, Bloomberg News Autos Team Leader, break down President Trump's comments on Harley moving some U.S. production and impact on the stock. Jon Erlichman, Anchor of BNN Bloomberg's The Open, talks about how Netflix, whose shares have doubled since the beginning of the year, could continue to grow. And we Drive to the Close with Lori Heinel, Deputy Global CIO at State Street Global Advisors.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
